events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position and all relevant materials including resume and cover letter are submitted successfully.
The candidate's profile has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering cluster based on skills in software development and coding experience.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and guide them through the recruitment process.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening call where their software engineering background and project experience were discussed in detail.
The candidate promptly responded to our interview scheduling request and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 3 PM UTC, focusing on coding challenges and system design relevant to the software engineer role.
